description:
Kamakiri no Su (Zenpen):
The past six months since she remarried, Chihiro has hardly talked to Akitoshi, her stepson. She worried that he would not accept her. Akitoshi on the other hand knew his father, and that their marriage was sexless. He wants to take his father’s place in that regard. Slowly she noticed that her feelings changed.
Kamakiri no Su (Kouhen):
Chihiro`s husband decides to go on an overseas business trip, and the sexual activity with Akitoshi continues. The happiness she missed in the marriage now starts to become a reality, and her lust increases, oh and her stomach...

titles.title: Kamakiri no Su (Zenpen) / Kamakiri no Su (Kouhen)
蟷螂の巣 (前編) / 蟷螂の巣 (後編)
